lines.character: Dr. Haines, Academy of Surgical Research

lines.text: Are you going swimming with me in the morning?
What will you do if I start to sink and yell for help?
Throw you an anvil. Good night!
Something tells me if I go in that room tonight, tomorrow I'll be... in my coffin!
Professor, since we retired this body has been... It has been...
lines.character: Dr. Haines, Academy of Surgical Research

lines.text: I know, but I don't want her to know.

[to the Piano Player]
Hey, Rachmaninoff - how 'bout the Prelude?
